de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Interface DBIDRangeDistanceFunction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DBIDDistanceFunction, DistanceFunction<DBID>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDBIDRangeDistanceFunction, DiskCacheBasedDoubleDistanceFunction, DiskCacheBasedFloatDistanceFunction, FileBasedDoubleDistanceFunction, FileBasedFloatDistanceFunction

    public interface DBIDRangeDistanceFunction
extends DBIDDistanceFunction
    Distance functions valid in a static database context only (i.e. for DBIDRanges) For any "distance" that cannot be computed for arbitrary objects, only those that exist in the database and referenced by their ID. Furthermore, the IDs must be contiguous. Example: external precomputed distances

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double distance(int i1, int i2)
      Compute the distance for two integer offsets.
